body_html:
That makes a lot of sense.

If the Python script isn't far away, or even if the script is and this stuff will make it harder for you in the future, definitely close it. I did this because my build failed (locate not on system), and I just edited a few other things while I was looking at the file, and uploaded my changes. I figured I'd check to see if I should continue to do more on this file, or just leave it. If it's helpful, I can also fix it up a bit without spending too much time on additional things, but if not, feel free to kill it.

If the Python script isn't far away, or even if the script is and this stuff will make it harder for you in the future, definitely close it.
